thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not as advertised
thread.title_full: Not as advertised - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ruth N
title: Not as advertised
text:
Stay at Earls court Holiday inn
Arrived on the 22 March was told close to Earls court not true we had a 30.minute walk from the tube with our luggage. Missing towel phoned for towel none brought to us A 20.minute bus ride just to catch a tour bus. Smoke alarm went off early this morning no one came to check it out. So disappointed in this hotel and location. Would not recommend or stay here again.
